title: Ability power nerf for Veigar
body: Veigar needs at least an ability power gain capacity of 1500 for his passive. Dealing with a Veigar that can one-shot everything is not fun to play with, as or against. This should apply to other champs as well.

replies.body: It’s your responsibility to take advantage of champions weaknesses. If your letting a game go on until veigar has over 1500 ap he’s hitting his win condition. You didn’t take advantage of his weak early game to put him behind and snowball the game

honestly though, how OFTEN does a long game of LoL occur?
and how many champs have the capacity to just
STOP veigar from getting any stacks or momentum
I think that veigar late game should not change as he is weak early and should be a mid to late game champion

I agree, same story with Nasus, build full tank, still deal ridiculous damage (stupid fact, with 45% cdr on Nasus, you can wither someone and before they can escape the first slow, you can do it again if they have no tenacity, pretty stupid tbh)
